member.summary: When implemented by a class, evaluates the condition it checks and updates the property.

member.summary: Returns True if user's input is valid, False otherwise

member.name: M:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.ValidateCaptcha(System.String)
member.summary: Validate the user's text against the CAPTCHA text

member.summary: returns HTML-ized color strings

member.name: M:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CssStyle
member.summary: returns css "style=" tag for this control based on standard control visual properties

member.summary: render raw control HTML to the page

member.summary: generate a new captcha and store it in the ASP.NET Cache by unique GUID

member.summary: Retrieve the user's CAPTCHA input from the posted data

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.ErrorInputTooFast
member.summary: Error message to show when user entered response too fast.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.ErrorInputTooSlow
member.summary: Error message to show when user entered response too late.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.System#Web#UI#IValidator#IsValid
member.summary: When implemented by a class, gets or sets a value indicating whether the user-entered content in the specified control passes validation.
member.returns: true if the content is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.UserValidated
member.summary: Returns True if the user was CAPTCHA validated after a postback.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CaptchaFont
member.summary: Font used to render CAPTCHA text. If font name is blank, a random font will be chosen.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CaptchaChars
member.summary: Characters used to render CAPTCHA text. A character will be picked randomly from the string.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CaptchaLength
member.summary: Number of CaptchaChars used in the CAPTCHA text

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CaptchaMinTimeout
member.summary: Minimum number of seconds CAPTCHA must be displayed before it is valid. If you're too fast, you must be a robot. Set to zero to disable.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.CaptchaMaxTimeout
member.summary: Maximum number of seconds CAPTCHA will be cached and valid. If you're too slow, you may be a CAPTCHA hack attempt. Set to zero to disable.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.ArithmeticFunction
member.summary: Specifies arithmetic operation to use when generating a new captcha

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.BackColor
member.summary: Background color for the captcha image

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.FontColor
member.summary: Color of captcha text

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.NoiseColor
member.summary: Color for dots in the background noise

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.LineColor
member.summary: Color for the background lines of the captcha image

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.IsDesignMode
member.summary: are we in design mode?

member.name: T:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.arithmeticOperation
member.summary: Arithmetic operation to perform in formula. Users must enter the result of arithmetic operation, not what they see in Captcha image.

member.name: F:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.arithmeticOperation.Random
member.summary: Will result in unpredictable operation selected as ArithmeticOperation. This should harden the work for bots.

member.name: T:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.clientHashingAlgorithm
member.summary: Hashing algorithm used for Captcha value. MD5 is a recommended value.

member.name: F:MSCaptcha.CaptchaControl.clientHashingAlgorithm.MD5
member.summary: While broken, MD5 is the fastest method. It is impossible to crack MD5 during the normal lifetime of Captcha.

member.name: M:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.RenderImage
member.summary: Forces a new Captcha image to be generated using current property value settings.

member.summary: Returns a random font family from the font whitelist

member.summary: generate random text for the CAPTCHA

member.summary: Returns a random point within the specified x and y ranges

member.summary: Returns a random point within the specified rectangle

member.summary: Returns the CAPTCHA font in an appropriate size

member.summary: Renders the CAPTCHA image

member.summary: Returns the date and time this image was last rendered

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.Font
member.summary: Font family to use when drawing the Captcha text. If no font is provided, a random font will be chosen from the font whitelist for each character.

member.summary: Amount of random warping to apply to the Captcha text.

member.summary: Amount of background noise to apply to the Captcha image.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.TextChars
member.summary: A string of valid characters to use in the Captcha text. A random character will be selected from this string for each character.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.TextLength
member.summary: Number of characters to use in the Captcha text.

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.Text
member.summary: Returns the randomly generated Captcha text.

member.summary: Width of Captcha image to generate, in pixels

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.Height
member.summary: Height of Captcha image to generate, in pixels

member.name: P:MSCaptcha.CaptchaImage.FontWhitelist
member.summary: A semicolon-delimited list of valid fonts to use when no font is provided.
